backend/main.mo: Defines types for advancement rules and manages groups, stages, and round‑robin stage configs with add and create operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a knockout bracket fix to the specific frontend generator file and project components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend tournament-related files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page bootstrapping the React app with a root div and main.tsx entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Routes between setup, schedule, full schedule, and knockout views using tournament store state.
frontend/src/components/AdvancementConfi: Dialog UI for configuring per-stage winner and runner‑up advancement destinations with selectable NextStage/Knockout/Eliminated options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main layout wrapper with container styling and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/KnockoutPairingE: Allows auto or manual assignment of teams to first‑round knockout fixtures using store state and qualification utilities.
frontend/src/components/MatchDateTimeEdi: Component for editing match date and time, persisting updates to the tournament store.
frontend/src/components/RoundRobinGroupT: Displays round‑robin groups with editable team names and consistent row heights across groups.
frontend/src/components/Stage2GroupAssig: Shows a preview of how winners and runners‑up advance between round‑robin stages based on configs.
Builds a JSON export of the current stage and triggers a file download of group and team data.
frontend/src/features/tournament/generat: Generates all round‑robin stages, groups, and matches, and computes team advancement for each stage.
frontend/src/features/tournament/groupNa: Generates group names using A–Z and extended patterns like AA, AB for higher indexes.
frontend/src/features/tournament/knockou: Builds knockout bracket matches by pairing qualified teams across rounds with support for auto/manual assignment.
Defines knockout round names, order, and helper functions for identifying and indexing rounds.
frontend/src/features/tournament/matchCo: Calculates total match counts across round‑robin and knockout stages with per‑stage breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/tournament/qualifi: Determines which teams qualify for knockout rounds based on per‑stage advancement rules.
frontend/src/features/tournament/roundRo: Generates round-robin match pairings for a group by creating all unique team combinations. Returns Match objects with IDs and metadata.
frontend/src/features/tournament/types.t: Defines interfaces for teams, groups, matches, stages, advancement rules, and tournament state structures. Used throughout scheduling and knockout configuration.
frontend/src/features/tournament/useTour: Provides a Zustand store managing tournament configuration, generation, match updates, and knockout settings. Persists state and coordinates generation functions.
frontend/src/features/tournament/validat: Validates team counts, group configs, advancement rules, and date/time formats. Also formats advancement destinations and labels for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes. Uses React Query for lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication with context, including login, logout, identity loading, and auth-client configuration. Exposes identity state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend-related query logic with no current implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers plus CSS variables for light and dark themes. Applies global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/FullSchedulePage.tsx: Displays the full tournament schedule including round-robin stages and grouped knockout matches. Provides navigation to group view and knockout view.
frontend/src/pages/KnockoutPage.tsx: Displays knockout-stage matches grouped by round, validates qualified team counts, and provides navigation and reset controls.
frontend/src/pages/StageSchedulePage.tsx: Shows stage group assignments with editing and navigation options, plus a reset confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/TournamentSetupPage.t: Handles initial tournament setup including team count, round configs, advancement rules, and regeneration/reset prompts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and required fix for knockout bracket match counts.
